qas.question: What does the Busk Fund support?

answers.text: individual ventures that show particular initiative

qas.question: Which Fund is dedicated for travel to non-English speaking countries?
Which Fund supports travel to classical lands?

answers.text: the C.M. Wells Memorial Trust Fund

qas.question: What grant is given for boys who want to travel to countries where English is the main language?
What grant is given to boys who want to enter the teaching profession?
What fund is for boys who want to travel to Africa?
What fund is for boys who want to travel to Asia?

context: Various benefactions make it possible to give grants each year to boys who wish, for educational or cultural reasons, to work or travel abroad. These include the <b5_0>Busk Fund<b5_0/>, which supports <a0_0>individual ventures that show particular initiative<a0_0/>; <a2_0>the <b4_0><b6_0>C.M. Wells Memorial Trust Fund<b6_0/><b4_0/><a2_0/>, for the promotion of visits to classical lands; the Sadler Fund, which supports, amongst others, those intending to enter the Foreign Service; and the <a1_0><b3_0>Marsden Fund<b3_0/><a1_0/>, for travel in countries where the principal language is not English.
